original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says: I will bring Israel's people back from the countries where I sent them to live. Then all the nations will see that I am a holy God for my people. My people will live in their own land that I gave to my servant, Jacob. Jacob was the ancestor of the Israelite people. This is what the Almighty Lord says: I will bring Israel's people back from the countries where I sent them to live. Then all the nations will see that I am a holy God for my people. My people will live in their own land that I gave to my servant, Jacob. Jacob was the ancestor of the Israelite people. This is what the Almighty Lord says: I will bring Israel's people back from the countries where I sent them to live. Then all the nations will see that I am a holy God for my people. My people will live in their own land that I gave to my servant, Jacob.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 내가 여러 민족 가운데에 흩어져 있는 이스라엘 족속을 모으고 그들로 말미암아 여러 나라의 눈 앞에서 내 거룩함을 나타낼 때에 그들이 고국 땅 곧 내 종 야곱에게 준 땅에 거주할지라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 전능하신 주께서 말씀하시는 바입니다:

sentences.original_text: I will bring Israel's people back
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이스라엘 백성을 돌아오게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: from the countries where I sent them to live.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들이 살도록 보낸 국가들로부터

sentences.original_text: Then all the nations will see
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 모든 민족들이 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: that I am a holy God for my people.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 백성을 위한 거룩한 하나님이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: My people will live in their own land
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성은 그들 자신의 땅에서 살 것이다

sentences.original_text: that I gave to my servant, Jacob.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 종 야곱에게 주었던 그 땅에서

sentences.original_text: Jacob was the ancestor of the Israelite people.
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱은 이스라엘 백성의 조상이었다
